nodes.bodyText: I don't understand why people think switch is somehow less messy. This is more lines of code, and you need a break statement after every case. It's not any better than an if-chain.
Really, it just matters as how its implemented throughout the code, and, after checking, this is how its used a lot of the time, so I'll revert it. (its just a matter of style 👍 )
Never use SCREAMING_SNAKE_CASE, see the guidelines for why.
